title: Add .env support for data folder configuration
description: Update config.py to load .env file with python-dotenv. Support GLORIOUS_DATA_DIR and GLORIOUS_DB_PATH environment variables. Fallback to default locations if not set.

title: Design unified database schema with table prefixes
description: Design single database schema with prefixed tables: notes_, issues_, agents_, cache_, feedback_, prompts_, automations_, etc. Ensure no naming conflicts. Document prefix conventions.

title: Create database migration script to merge 3 databases
description: Build script to merge agent.db, issues.db, master.db into single glorious-agents.db. Handle table renaming with prefixes. Preserve all data and relationships. Add rollback capability.

title: Update all skills to use unified database
description: Update skill schema files and initialization to use table prefixes. Update queries to reference new table names. Test each skill after migration.

title: Add backward compatibility for legacy database locations
description: Detect legacy database files (.agent/, .issues/). Auto-migrate if found. Show migration notice to users. Provide manual migration instructions.
